translation.en: Ready to forget once and for all.
Now feel yourselves getting sleepier and sleepier.
Neither of you will remember the last year.
translation.ko: 둘 다 작년을 기억 못 하게 됩니다

translation.en: There is no place called The Further.
You will only remember Dalton's coma.
And let the darkness drift further...
[Dalton] For everything, there is a season.
and a time to throw away.
A time to mourn, and a time to dance.
A time for war, and a time for peace.
[woman] We therefore commit this body to the ground.
Earth to earth, ashes to ashes,
[Renai] It was a beautiful service for a beautiful grandma.
She loved you guys so much.
Your mother was a fine friend, Josh. Thank you.
I know she misses you too, Kali.
Okay, that's not true, and she does miss you.
See you guys next weekend, okay?
-See what I mean? -He's just anxious about leaving.
Thank you for organizing all this. I just haven't had the bandwidth.
translation.ko: 여러모로 고생 많았어 신경도 못 썼는데

translation.en: Why don't you drive him to school?
You have a few weeks until all your students show up.
translation.ko: 당신 학교 개학까지 몇 주 남았잖아

translation.en: -Nah, he wouldn't want me to. -He's not the parent, you are.
If you don't want to, that's a different story. No, I can't.
Maybe some way that you guys could connect, that's all.
He's gonna be gone soon, so...
Appreciate you coming. I'm sorry I grabbed you.
-I got a lot on my mind. -I'm sure.
Death floods the mind with memory.
But there's always new ones to make, right?
[Josh] What did you just tell me? Well, just tell me, Dalton.
Do you wanna clean--? Do you wanna keep the same diaper on?
We can just clean out the diaper and then put the same diaper back on.
translation.ko: 이렇게 하자 기저귀 닦아내고 이거 다시 차는 거야

translation.en: -[baby Dalton exclaims] -You like that? Okay, I'll do that, then.
What kind of outfit do you want?
-Oop. What kind of outfit do you want? -[baby Dalton babbling]
-[Renai laughing on recording] -Yeah? Well, tell me.
All you got to do is talk to me.
Come on. It's the greatest guy in the world.
You're gonna have to pull out of your little funk or it's gonna be a long few days.
translation.ko: 그렇게 까칠하게 굴면 며칠 서로 괴로워져

translation.en: ♪ But if you're tired Of the same old story ♪
♪ I'll be here when you are ready... ♪

translation.en: I mean, she better be, with what we're paying.
♪ Those lives were mine To love and cherish ♪
♪ To guard and guide along life's way ♪

Kappa Tau, huh? I was, uh, Kappa Z.
I'll take one for him. Just put it... Thank you.
Oh, all right. You get first dibs.
Why don't you pick a bed?
Mom got you this, uh, power station thing.
What do you got here? You got, uh, two outlets...
USB port, and, uh, two jumper cables, which are useless.

translation.en: Guess Mom put it in there.
This is intense. This what you been working on?
Did you do this from memory?
It's from a photo I found at the house.
Felt like. The last few years.
She had a tough go, you know, being a single mom.
Yeah, yeah, that's... Yeah, that's tough.
Guess I didn't make the wall, huh?
You know, I'm sorry I haven't been around lately.
Of course, my dad wasn't around at all, but...
So, it could be a lot worse.
I've just been a little foggy past few years.
translation.ko: 단지 좀… 몇 년째 머리가 멍한 게…

translation.en: I don't know, my brain just...
haven't been able to manage a time
for, uh, you and your brother and sister.
translation.ko: 여유가 안 나서 너희를 못 챙겼어

translation.en: Have you ever thought about getting help?
I'm just trying to push through.
I just-- I thought my roommate would be a, um...
I just figured it's a liberal arts school, and we mean "liberal."
Yeah, probably just confused by the name "Chris."
Right. 'Cause that would never happen with a name like "Dalton."
You know, I'm gonna go down to the housing office and get this all sorted out.
No, no, no. Please, father of Dalton. Allow me.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 괜찮아요, 달튼 아버님 제가 갈게요 남자들 시간 방해했네요

translation.en: I clearly interrupted some boy bonding.
If you hate it, no worries. But you're not gonna hate it.
You really don't know me, do you? I mean, you really think I wanna join a frat?
I mean, do it for me. I drove you here.
-You didn't even want to. -Of course I did.
I heard what Mom said at the funeral.
Oh, so that makes you father of the year now?
At least you've got a father.
Stop blaming your dad for shit you screwed up.
He left like 40 years ago. Get over it. God knows I'm not gonna be defined by you.
translation.ko: 40년 전에 떠난 사람 그만 들먹여 아빠한테 휘둘리면서 살 생각 없어

translation.en: Are you kidding me? After all we have done for you?
translation.ko: 그걸 말이라고 해? 널 어떻게 키웠는데!

translation.en: When did you become this ungrateful, little shit?
You can tell it's Shania Twain, right?
So, what'd they say at housing?
I got to sleep here tonight.
But I'll get a new room tomorrow, so it's not a permanent thing.
-You're in the art school, I take it? -Yeah. Are you music?
but the artist's life is one of nomadic instability and much gnashing of teeth.
translation.ko: 예술가는 수입도 불안정하고 악착같이 살아야 하니까

translation.en: But I'm sure you'll be super successful.
-Uh, just a little piano. -It's the same thing. Just blow.
It's just something my mom wrote.
what's some weird shit about you?
On Sundays, I wear a monocle and I order takeout with a British accent.
translation.ko: 일요일마다 단안경 끼고 영국 억양으로 테이크아웃해

translation.en: Okay, sometimes I eat instant oatmeal,
uh, with no, like, water or milk or anything.
When I was 10, my parents died, and I went to go live with my Grandma Perkee,
who once went almost nearly blind from a gnarly case of athlete's foot.
I don't remember when I was 10.
At least that's what they told me, the few times that they would talk about it.
I don't even remember being sick.
It's like I woke up one day and a whole year had passed.
Yeah, honestly, I wish I could have forgotten a whole year when I was a kid.
Uh... you know, there is one more weird thing about me.
translation.ko: 그리고… 나 이상한 점이 하나 더 있는데

translation.en: Um, ever since my coma, I've been afraid of the dark.
I was afraid of Barbie dolls till I was, like... now.
There's nothing wrong with being scared.
Just as long as you don't keep me up with some bright-ass night light.
translation.ko: 밤새 환하게 불만 안 켜면 되지

translation.en: I can't get to the phone right now, so leave me a message and I'll give you a call back.
-[answering machine beeps] -[Josh] Hey, bud. It's me.
Just making sure you're getting settled in okay.
I was just, uh, thinking about what you said...
I don't know. I don't know what's going on with me, but, um...
And I just wanted you to know that.
Pull out something that will interest me.
translation.ko: 내가 관심 가질 만한 그림을 꺼내봐

translation.en: [Alec] I worked my ass off on this piece.
Usually, I go through introductions before someone quits.
You just haven't realized it yet. You can go.
translation.ko: 네가 아직 모르고 있을 뿐이지 가봐도 돼

translation.en: It doesn't mean anything if it doesn't come from inside.
I am not interested in the "rules of art."
We are going to break the rules.
Then I want you to break them again.
See how broken you can get.
Why in the hell would you destroy a beautiful drawing like that?
translation.ko: 그 아름다운 그림을 대체 왜 찢었지?

translation.en: Good. You must let go of your past.
Shed your skin in order to grow.
I want you to sink further and further into yourself.
translation.ko: 숫자마다 자신의 내면으로 깊이 들어가는 거야

translation.en: Do not lift the charcoal from the paper.
Draw whatever your soul brings forth.
You've got to be willing to dredge up
Is it keeping you in or out?
translation.ko: 널 가두고 있는 문? 아니면 내보내는 문?

translation.en: The machine is quite loud, but you'll be able to hear me.
translation.ko: 기계가 시끄럽겠지만 제 말은 들리실 거예요

translation.en: I'm going to need you to stay as still as possible throughout the procedure.
translation.ko: 검사가 끝날 때까지 최대한 가만히 계세요

translation.en: If you feel like you need to get out of there,
give the call ball a squeeze, we'll give you a break.
[Brower over headphones] Okay. You comfortable, Josh?
Yep. Let's just get this over with.
Dr. Brower, what did you say?
Okay, can you let me out, please?
-[call ball beeping] -Hello, hey! Can you let me out?
Okay, okay. Let me out. Let me out. Hey! Dr. Brower.
Come on. Get me out of here.
Just let me out. Let me out, let me out, let me out.
-Who was that? Why did the lights go out? -Calm down.
translation.ko: 아까 누구예요? 불이 왜 꺼져요! 진정하세요

translation.en: You said the lights went out?
All the lights went out and I got stuck in there, man.
You went right out. Your MRI went perfectly.
[Brower] There's nothing physically wrong with you. No growths or spots on the brain.
Yeah, no, I know, I, uh...
I guess I was just hoping for something real.
Something that could explain this fog.
translation.ko: 이 흐릿함을 설명해 줄 만한 이유

translation.en: The memory issues you're talking about,
they could be spurred on by a number of things.
Increased stress, change in daily habits.
Have there been any disruptions in your home life?
translation.ko: 댁에서 힘든 일을 겪으신 게 있나요?

translation.en: My, uh, mom passed away recently.
Not to mention my son left for school,
and, uh, my ex-wife hardly talks to me, so...
translation.ko: 아들이 대학 때문에 떠났고 전처는 말도 잘 안 하고

translation.en: Maybe a grief counselor be of some help?
Do you have any history of mental illness in your family?
It's nothing to be alarmed about.
It can be informative as we try to make a diagnosis.
Meanwhile, there are exercises, games you can do to stimulate your memory.

translation.ko: 애들이 하는 짝 맞추기 게임 같은

translation.en: You want me to play kids' games?
We can learn a lot from kids.
Got my new room assignment today.
So, alas, no more panty parties.
lest I hear you slap your sausage in the dead of night.

translation.en: No, it's just something my dad got me.
We can make fun of their khaki pants and trust funds.
Come on, Dolphin. Do something nice for your old man.
What's the worst that could happen?
May I offer you some diaper pudding?
Oh, come on. Quit your bitching and come here.
To memorialize the night that Dalton Lambert actually has fun!
translation.ko: 달튼이 재미 본 밤을 추억하기 위해!

translation.en: I'm just here to remind you fine folks that frats,
Right, and we must protect our right to party
White, Black, brown, or blue, you're all welcome at JPU,

that the frat house is the last house

translation.en: where men can still be men.

We do not need another incident.
-[student] Hey, rest in peace! -This party's lame.

And this is Nick's butthole cream.
I'm going to go spread this on the communal crapper. BRB.
[man] Make it stop. -Make it stop. -[haunting music playing]

♪ Tonight is your night, bro Tonight is the night ♪

translation.en: A dance would be nice. We can dance.
I think I just saw something...
-[Nick] Is somebody in my room? -Shit, shit, shit.
One of you peckerwoods is about to get the hammer drop.
We were just looking for some privacy, you know?
translation.ko: 조용한 곳을 찾다가… 우리 그거 하려고

translation.en: I'd rather watch my parents do it.
translation.ko: 우리 부모님이 하는 걸 보고 말지

translation.en: We might get drunk enough to find you attractive.
Even though you look like a clown.
I'm more partial to kick the dick.
That was pretty quick thinking back there, right?
[groans] I should've asked before I kissed you, right?
I am sorry. I was just... I was going on instinct.
I'm fine. It's just, I, um...
I'm just sorry for what he said to you.

translation.en: You think I care what Vineyard Vines thinks? He should be so lucky.

Um, I went to the doctor.
Well, not okay. But I'm getting to the bottom of it.
So, uh, just give me a call when you can.
I'm really sorry, Dalton, about what I said the other day.
Please don't tell me you're really just a creep.

translation.en: Then what the hell is going on?
Something's happening to me. I'm seeing things, crazy things.
translation.ko: 내 눈에 이상한 것들이 보이고 있어

translation.en: You know that kid at the frat house that they talked about, with the incident?
translation.ko: 형제단 하우스에서 사고 난 애 있잖아?

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -I saw him. And he was dead.
It started with an art exercise,
and she asked us to dig deep into a memory, into our subconscious.
So, I did and I drew this door.
You really need to lay off the frat juice.
Tonight, I was painting and I fell asleep.
And when I woke up, this lantern appeared.
It was like a dream, but it wasn't a dream.
And then I walked to your room.
I feel like I'm getting closer to something.
Or something's getting closer to me.
[sighs] I don't know. I don't know.
The dance of light and shadow.
An effect used not only to create volume and definition,
but also a specific, unseen light source.
Right. This is one of Goya's best.
The negative space draws our eyes towards Saturn.

translation.en: -Does it represent darkness or some void? -[haunting music playing]
translation.ko: 어둠을 표현한 걸까? 아니면 빈 공간?

translation.en: Goya mastered it on the canvas,
but family problems and health issues sent this once-revered court painter
translation.ko: 이 존경받던 궁중 화가는 사실 가족과 건강 문제로

translation.en: leading him to create this grisly portrait
of a father devouring his son.
This balance between light and dark is what we're after.
translation.ko: 우린 이 명암의 균형을 추구해야 하는 거야

translation.en: Your own experiences shape your artwork. Embrace them. Use them.
translation.ko: 자신의 경험이 작품을 형성하는 거야 받아들이고 이용해

translation.en: Sink deep into the darkness of memory.
Come on, man. Doesn't that mean anything to you? A red door?
translation.ko: 뭐 떠오르는 거 없어? 빨간 문

translation.en: It's a thing from art class. It's a painting.
translation.ko: 미술 수업 때 그린 그림 얘긴데

translation.en: We had to find a memory.
I thought it was something from our childhood.
No, I don't want to worry her.
-I don't know. -This what happens when you go to college?
You get all cryptic and shit?
So, after the whole spooky dream-not-a-dream thing the other night,
translation.ko: 저번의 그 꿈인 듯 꿈 아닌 꿈 후로

translation.en: "Yeah, okay, Dalton's a weirdo, but he's not insane, right?"
I'm gonna need that key back.
Right. So, I started poking around the old interwebs...
Looks like they filmed it in between shifts at Best Buy.
translation.ko: 전자 대리점 직원들이 쉴 때 찍은 거 같네

translation.en: Hey, guys, this is Spectral Sightings. I'm Specs, this is Tucker. Say hi, Tucker.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 심령 탐험단 스펙스, 터커예요, 인사해

translation.en: We're gonna talk about something that dozens of you
[Specs] It's a real phenomenon. Our physical body falls asleep
and our astral body leaves that physical body...
and floats off into another realm.
-That's exactly what it feels like. -See, I told you. It's cool, right?
Our former mentor, Dr. Elise Rainier,
she had a name for this other realm.
It's nice to see you all.
So, I'm here to talk to you about astral projection...
filled with tortured souls of the dead...
to live the worst mistakes of their lives
over and over and over for all eternity.
or you travel to this realm...
that you awaken with your presence.
Life is what they crave more than anything.
They want life, and they can come to our world to get it.
translation.ko: 그들은 생명을 원하고 생명을 취하려 우리 세상으로 나오죠

translation.en: [groans] I see those gears turning. What is it?
translation.ko: 머리 굴리는 거 봐라, 또 뭔데?

translation.en: -That kid from the frat house? -The pukey kid?
translation.ko: 형제단 하우스에서 본 애 있잖아 토하는 애?

translation.en: Yeah. He said something to me.
I'm sure he did. It probably wasn't his proudest moment.
Yeah, but what if he meant something else?
What if he was talking about this door?
So, what? You want to go back and ask him?
Look, I feel bad for the dude, I do,
but dark realms are typically places I try to avoid.
It's not like Nick the Dick is just gonna let you waltz into his bedroom
translation.ko: 근데 꽈추닉이 순순히 들여보내고 유령이랑 수다 떨게 두진 않을걸

translation.en: and chat with the ghost in his toilet.
-I got this. -[woman] Can I help you?
I have left my brassiere in Nicholas's room,
translation.ko: 안녕, 브래지어를 닉의 방에 두고 왔어 혹시 방에 있어?

translation.en: and I was wondering if he is perchance home?
translation.ko: 닉의 방에 두고 왔어 혹시 방에 있어?

translation.en: I think he's upstairs studying with Paige.
[Chris in normal voice] Great job, Dolphin.
I'm gonna read you this. It's called In Flames.
Very vulnerable piece. "Looking across a campfire,
I need a room with darkness.
You gonna float through the air and do a little "Ooh"?
And you never will be with that attitude, Casper.
translation.ko: 그런 태도로는 절대 유령 못 돼

translation.en: What are the chances those bedsheets are crusty?
Probably snap like a taco shell.
-Can you give me a little space, please? -Oh, yeah. Sorry.
But I'm also crazy good at finance, so I don't want to waste that gift.
translation.ko: 근데 금융 쪽도 잘해서 재능을 낭비하긴 싫어

translation.en: How long do you have to keep that on?
[Nick] Seriously. Guys, who's messing with me?
-Chris. Hey. I didn't mean it like that... -Don't.
I just wanted to see if you're okay.
I'm sorry. I didn't know anyone could get hurt in the real world.
translation.ko: 미안, 현실의 누군가가 다칠 줄은 몰랐어

translation.en: You have no idea what you're messing with.
I can't be a part of this, Dalton.
And neither should you. Because next time, you might not wake up.
translation.ko: 너도 이제 그만둬 다음엔 못 깰지도 몰라

translation.en: Uh, it's not your weekend. Kali's at a sleepover and Foster's...
translation.ko: 이번 주말 아니잖아 캘리는 친구 집에서 자고

translation.en: I'm not here for the kids.
[Foster] Wow, two calls in one week.
-[Dalton] Come on, man. -Haven't you made any friends yet?
Tell me everything you remember about my coma.
translation.ko: 나 혼수상태 때 기억나는 거 말해봐

translation.en: And now a guy with a hammer.
translation.ko: 이제 어떤 남자가 망치를 들고 있어

translation.en: -A hammer? -I think they could be clues from my past,
thoughts that have disappeared 'cause of my coma.
translation.ko: 이게 단서일 것 같아 이유는 모르겠지만

translation.en: -I don't know why they're coming out now-- -Wait. Dalton.
translation.ko: 이게 단서일 것 같아 이유는 모르겠지만 - 요즘 갑자기… - 잠깐만 형

translation.en: I've had this image in my mind for years.
translation.ko: 나도 몇 년째 떠오르는 게 있어

translation.en: Mom always says it's not real. It's just a bad dream. But...
Tell me, little brother. Come on.
Okay. We're in a room somewhere. Like a basement.
translation.ko: 우리가 지하실 같은 어떤 방에 있어

translation.en: All I ever wanted was to be better than my father.
translation.ko: 난 아버지보단 나은 사람이 되고 싶었어

translation.en: You know that. Just to be a good dad.
Well, if it's any consolation, I can't even get him to call me back.
translation.ko: 위안이 될지 모르겠지만 나한테도 연락 없어

translation.en: My dad abandoned his family, and...
You're not him, Josh, and you're allowed to be angry at him.
translation.ko: 자긴 다른 사람이야 아버지한테 화낼 자격 있어

translation.en: I am angry. I've been angry for a long time.
Angry at a man that I have never met.
Angry at a man that jumped off the roof of a mental hospital in 1978.
For more than 40 years, that man has been dead and gone.
So, how in the hell is he terrorizing me here, now, in the real world?
translation.ko: 근데 어떻게 현실에서 날 겁줄 수가 있지?

translation.en: -He attacked me at Mom's... -He attacked you?
Yeah. So, am I just crazy, or...?
left this for my mom the day he died.
-Josh... -Is that the answer? Am I just crazy?
Is his madness inside of me?
Is that why I've been so lost the past few years?
Did I pass this curse on to our kids? Is he gonna haunt them...
translation.ko: 내 아이들에게도 이 저주를 물려준 걸까?

translation.en: Why didn't my mother say anything about this? Stop.
translation.ko: - 그만, 그만 - 왜 엄마는 이걸 숨겼지?

translation.en: So, Dalton and I could travel to some other...
where we were haunted by ghosts and goblins.
like the one in those photos that haunted you.
translation.ko: 그 사진 속의 유령들이 당신을 쫓아왔어

translation.en: And your father, he saw them too, and...
Back then, he told your mom. She didn't understand.
-She didn't know how to help him. -Help him like you helped us?
translation.ko: 어떻게 도울지도 모르셨을 거야 당신처럼 도우라고?

translation.en: We all thought it was for the best, Josh. You included.
The suppression, it slowed you down.
And your mom and I, we didn't know what to do.
translation.ko: 어머님이랑 난 어째야 할 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: And I was too scared to tell you the truth.
He said my mom had secrets, that she was hiding something from us.
I just never thought you did too.
-...you have kept this away from me. -...how hard it has been for me.
translation.ko: - 나도 얼마나 힘들었는데 - 10년이나 숨기다니 - 왜 그랬어? - 당신은 몰라

translation.en: Because you tried to kill our family.
You chased us around the house with a goddamn baseball bat!
translation.ko: 당신이 야구방망이 들고 온 집안을 쫓아다녔어!

translation.en: -What? -I mean, I knew that it wasn't you. I knew it was that...
thing in those photos, but the kids? They don't understand.
All those night terrors that Foster had.
I've been lying to our children for a decade, telling them those memories aren't real.
"They're just your imagination. Dad's not gonna hurt you."
Doesn't matter to them what was controlling you.
translation.ko: 당신이 뭐에 조종당했든 애들한텐 중요하지 않아

translation.en: What they saw was your face. It was you who was causing all that pain.
translation.ko: 당신 얼굴을 봤잖아 당신이 고통의 원인이라고

translation.en: That's why I pulled away. I just...
I couldn't live like that anymore.
we could've gotten through this together.
Dalton just sent this to me.
He's been having nightmares and visions.
-[Renai] It's gonna be okay. -[young Foster] I don't know.
It's okay. Nothing's gonna happen to us. I promise you, okay?
translation.ko: 아무 일 없을 거야 엄마가 약속할게

translation.en: Take care of your brother, Dalton.
[young Foster] But why is Daddy mad at us?
translation.ko: 왜 아빠가 우리한테 화가 난 거야?

translation.en: I can go into the dark place and find Daddy.
translation.ko: 내가 어두운 세계로 가서 아빠 찾아볼게

translation.en: -[Renai] No, it's too dangerous. -I can do it, though.
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 위험해 - 그래도 할 수 있어

translation.en: No! Stop! What are you doing?
translation.ko: 안 돼! 멈춰! 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: [Tiny Tim] And now, my dear friends,
I'd like to dedicate this song to all of you out there.
Sitting on the floor, being weird. That's normal.
translation.ko: 바닥에 희한하게 앉아 있고 지극히 정상이네

translation.en: Because I thought that when the power went out,
translation.ko: 괜찮은 거지? 정전됐길래 어둠의 세계인지 뭔지 또 하나 했어

translation.en: that you were messing with that dark realm shit again.
translation.ko: 정전됐길래 어둠의 세계인지 뭔지 또 하나 했어

translation.en: [chuckles] And I know that you don't really care for the dark. So, I figured...
translation.ko: 넌 어두운 거 전혀 안 무섭댔으니까

translation.en: much like how I illuminate your life.
I'm not afraid of the dark anymore.
Well, I hauled these all the way down here, so they're going up anyway.
Even though you're totally freaking annoying. Jeez.
I got your text and I wrote a snarky response.
translation.ko: 네 문자 받고 답문자 까칠하게 썼는데

translation.en: because Grandma Perkee always told me to never escalate an argument over text.
But, I mean, if you want my opinion...
Don't go digging around in your past.
Some things are just better left buried, you know?
translation.ko: 어떤 건 묻어두는 게 낫기도 해

translation.en: sometimes you just have to move on.
translation.ko: 어떨 땐 잊고 나아가야 하는 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna get you out of this place, Dalton.
We're gonna get out of here and we're gonna get home, okay?
Dalton, tell me you're in there.
Dalton, I know you're in there.
But if you touch me again, I'm gonna fuck you up.
translation.ko: 또 날 건드리면 박살 내 줄 거야

translation.en: Dalton, these things, they can possess our bodies.
It happened to me, and now he's done it to you.
-[yells] No! -We can't hold it back, Dad.
We got to find something to block it. Something to seal it.
translation.ko: 막을 걸 찾아야 해 봉인할 걸 찾아

translation.en: [Chris] You need to get rid of that thing. Burn it, forget about it.
No, no, forgetting it doesn't work. We need to remember.
Yes. Yes, he's back. He's okay.
Tell Foster to pack his history homework. I'll help him with it.
translation.ko: 포스터한테 도와줄 테니 역사 숙제 가져오라고 해

translation.en: Could come a little earlier if you want. Join us for dinner.
translation.ko: 좀 일찍 와서 저녁 같이 해

translation.en: Guess I'm just lost in memories.
There's so much I want to tell her.
You have a bright future ahead.
